All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
An interface for defining the behavior of buttons
AssetManager
Contains constant fields of asset paths and a method for getting an asset
Boss
Boss class
Cavegirl
Cavegirl class
Caveman
Caveman class
Directions
Direction enum for entities
Dog
Dog class
Dungeon
Dungeon level where the player fights the enemies
DungeonData
Keeps tile layout information for the dungeon
Entity
The base class for entities
EntityManager
The controller class for entities in the game
Game
Game is a class that implement Runnable, which inits the game and starts game loop in a new thread by passing itself
GameOver
Displays death screen
GamePanel
The panel where the game will be drawn
GameState
Enum for defining the game states
GameWindow
The container for GamePanel
Item
Represents all items in the game.
Item.ItemType
Enum for specifying type of the item
KeyboardListener
When added to the gamePanel, KeyboardListener takes inputs and passes them to the current State's methods
Level
Abstract base class for Levels
Main
Holds main method which starts the Game
Menu
Initial state which has buttons for entering the game and settings or exiting the game
MenuButton
Buttons which are located only in the Menu state
MouseListener
When added to the gamePanel, MouseListener takes mouse inputs and passes them to the current State's methods
Overworld
Forest level where the dungeon entrance is located
OverworldData
Keeps tile layout information for the overworld
Player
Player class represents the player in the game.
Playing
the state where
RedNinja
RedNinja class
SaveData
A class which can be stored as a file to save player's progress
Settings
Settings menu state
Skeleton
Skeleton class
SoundManager
SoundManager class manages the audio in the game.
State
The base class for game states
WeatherTime
The class which controls rain and time
